headline: Restaurants & Caf√©s
description: Reviews highlight food quality, ambiance, and customer service. Helps customers decide where to eat or hang out. High ratings increase foot traffic.

headline: Educational Institutions
description: Coaching centers, schools, and universities gain credibility through reviews. Parents and students use them to evaluate options.

headline: Hotels & Resorts
description: Reviews are critical for booking decisions, especially from travelers. High ratings attract both local and international tourists.

headline: Medical Services
description: Hospitals, clinics, diagnostic centers, and pharmacies benefit from reviews. Feedback often mentions service quality, waiting times, and staff behavior.

headline: Beauty & Wellness
description: Salons, spas, and gyms use reviews to attract customers. Feedback often includes comments about hygiene and service quality.

headline: Travel & Tourism Agencies
description: Reviews help tourists choose agencies for trips and tours. Positive experiences attract more clients.

headline: IT & Repair Services
description: Laptop, mobile, and home appliance repair services thrive on positive feedback. Clients prefer businesses with reliable and trusted reviews.

headline: Real Estate & Property Management
description: Real estate agencies and developers gain trust via reviews for their properties and services.

headline: Retail Stores
description: Clothing stores, supermarkets, and electronic shops rely on reviews for trust-building. Positive reviews showcase product quality and customer service.

headline: Logistics & Delivery Services
description: Reviews build trust in companies offering courier and delivery services. Timely delivery and good customer support are key factors.
